front.title: DHCP Options for Home Information Discovery in Mobile IPv6 (MIPv6)

abstract.t: This document defines a DHCP-based scheme to enable dynamic discovery of Mobile IPv6 home network information. New DHCP options are defined that allow a mobile node to request the home agent IP address, Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN), or home network prefix and obtain it via the DHCP response.
